## Importa Chla

```{r importaChla}
  chla <- read.delim('Data/Clorofila.txt', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

require(lubridate)
val_01 <- 1

for(i in 1:nrow(chla)){
  #if (isna(chla[i,1])) 
  if (isna(chla$Year[i]))
    chla[1,i] <- val_01
  else
    val_01 <- chla[1,i]
}
```
